info.brief_description: Ever wanted to explore any sort of pairing with Lilo and Stitch characters? Now you can!
info.description:
It's been whispered and suggested, but never done...until now! An exploration of pairings of every single kind for the Lilo and Stitch fandom! Lilo/Stitch, Stitch/Angel, Bonnie/Clyde, Nani/David, all standard...but now it can get weirder! Hamsterviel and Lilo! Angel and Clyde! Gantu and Jumba! Pleakley and Nani! Yuna and Myrtle! XD

Feel free to use whatever pairing you want, be it guy/girl or girl/girl or guy/guy! Remember this is all meant to explore what the different character relationships might be like. And have fun, above all. The more additions we get, the better! Any experiment, ANY character from the Lilo and Stitch series (anime included) can be a character in this story.

Remember: this story's rated 18 and up for sexual content and, if needed, some harsh words. Keep the violence to a minimum...no killing whatsoever, alright?

Enjoy and good luck!
